sqlQuery: INSERT INTO public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TYPE"(id, workflowtype) SELECT nextval('hibernate_sequence'), 'Report' WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT id from public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TYPE" WHERE workflowtype = 'Report');

INSERT INTO public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TYPE"(id, workflowtype) SELECT nextval('hibernate_sequence'), 'AUTOML' WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT id from public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TYPE" WHERE workflowtype = 'AUTOML');

INSERT INTO public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TYPE"(id, workflowtype) SELECT nextval('hibernate_sequence'), 'SYSTEM' WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT id from public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TYPE" WHERE workflowtype = 'SYSTEM');

INSERT INTO public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TYPE"(id, workflowtype) SELECT nextval('hibernate_sequence'), 'GRAFANADASHBOARDPDFREPORT' WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT id from public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TYPE" WHERE workflowtype = 'GRAFANADASHBOARDPDFREPORT');

INSERT INTO public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TYPE"(id, workflowtype) SELECT nextval('hibernate_sequence'), 'UPSHIFTASSESSMENT' WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT id from public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TYPE" WHERE workflowtype = 'UPSHIFTASSESSMENT');

INSERT INTO public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TASK"(taskid, componentname, dependency, description, mqchannel, workflowtype) SELECT nextval('hibernate_sequence'), 'com.cognizant.devops.platformreports.assessment.core.ReportKPISubscriber', 1, 'REPORT_KPI_Execute', 'WORKFLOW.TASK.KPI.EXCECUTION', 'Report' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT taskid FROM public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TASK" WHERE description = 'REPORT_KPI_Execute');

INSERT INTO public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TASK"(taskid, componentname, dependency, description, mqchannel, workflowtype) SELECT nextval('hibernate_sequence'), 'com.cognizant.devops.platformreports.assessment.core.PDFExecutionSubscriber', 2, 'REPORT_PDF_Execute', 'WORKFLOW.TASK.PDF.EXCECUTION', 'Report' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT taskid FROM public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TASK" WHERE description = 'REPORT_PDF_Execute');

INSERT INTO public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TASK"(taskid, componentname, dependency, description, mqchannel, workflowtype) SELECT nextval('hibernate_sequence'), 'com.cognizant.devops.platformreports.assessment.core.ReportEmailSubscriber', 3, 'REPORT_EMAIL_Execute', 'WORKFLOW.TASK.EMAIL.EXCECUTION', 'Report' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT taskid FROM public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TASK" WHERE description = 'REPORT_EMAIL_Execute');

INSERT INTO public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TASK"(taskid, componentname, dependency, description, mqchannel, workflowtype) SELECT nextval('hibernate_sequence'), 'com.cognizant.devops.platformreports.assessment.upshift.core.UpshiftAssessmentExecutionSubscriber', 0, 'UPSHIFTNODE_Execute', 'WORKFLOW.TASK.UPSHIFTREPORT.EXCECUTION', 'UPSHIFTASSESSMENT' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT taskid FROM public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TASK" WHERE description = 'UPSHIFTNODE_Execute');

INSERT INTO public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TASK"(taskid, componentname, dependency, description, mqchannel, workflowtype) SELECT nextval('hibernate_sequence'), 'com.cognizant.devops.platformreports.assessment.upshift.core.UpshiftAssessmentRelationExecutionSubscriber', 1, 'UPSHIFTRELATION_Execute', 'WORKFLOW.TASK.UPSHIFTRELATION.EXCECUTION', 'UPSHIFTASSESSMENT' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT taskid FROM public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TASK" WHERE description = 'UPSHIFTRELATION_Execute');

INSERT INTO public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TASK"(taskid, componentname, dependency, description, mqchannel, workflowtype) SELECT nextval('hibernate_sequence'), 'com.cognizant.devops.platformreports.assessment.core.GrafanaPDFExecutionSubscriber', 0, 'GRAFANA_PDF_Execute', 'WORKFLOW.TASK.GRAFANAPDF.EXCECUTION', 'GRAFANADASHBOARDPDFREPORT' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT taskid FROM public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TASK" WHERE description = 'GRAFANA_PDF_Execute');

INSERT INTO public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TASK"(taskid, componentname, dependency, description, mqchannel, workflowtype) SELECT nextval('hibernate_sequence'), 'com.cognizant.devops.platformreports.assessment.core.ReportEmailSubscriber', 1, 'Grafana_Email_Exeute', 'WORKFLOW.TASK.EMAIL.EXCECUTION', 'GRAFANADASHBOARDPDFREPORT' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT taskid FROM public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TASK" WHERE description = 'Grafana_Email_Exeute');

INSERT INTO public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TASK"(taskid, componentname, dependency, description, mqchannel, workflowtype) SELECT nextval('hibernate_sequence'), 'com.cognizant.devops.automl.task.core.AutoMLSubscriber', -1, 'H2O_AutoML_Execute', 'WORKFLOW.TASK.AUTOML.EXCECUTION', 'AUTOML' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT taskid FROM public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TASK" WHERE description = 'H2O_AutoML_Execute');

INSERT INTO public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TASK"(taskid, componentname, dependency, description, mqchannel, workflowtype) SELECT nextval('hibernate_sequence'), 'com.cognizant.devops.platformreports.assessment.core.SystemNotificationDetailSubscriber', -1, 'SystemNotification_Execute', 'WORKFLOW.SYSTEM_TASK.SYSTEMNOTIFICATION.EXECUTION', 'SYSTEM' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT taskid FROM public."INSIGHTS_WORKFLOW_TASK" WHERE description = 'SystemNotification_Execute');
Update public.agent_configuration set iswebhook= false where iswebhook is null;
